column2:
"I see...
The Dark Falz that appeared ten years ago took the form of a child."
"If only one person said so, there's a possibility that they remembered it wrong. But if other people have said the same, that confirms it."
"It seems like [Apprentice] wasn't the only Dark Falz that appeared ten years ago, "

"When [Apprentice] lost the fight against 2nd Generation...
Double appeared."
"The loss of 2nd Generation, and the battle with [Apprentice], had a huge impact on Xion."

"So that's why everything about [Apprentice] was erased, but Double wasn't...
Makes sense."

"However, the [Apprentice] Double created...
Was that the real copy?"
"Then... Who's the [Apprentice] that keeps appearing around the mining base?"

"Ah, I knew I'd find you here <%me>.
It seems like Rogio has something to tell you."
"<%me>, can you sortie to the Mining Base right now?"
"Why?"
"Did you find something?"
"It's only a prediction, but [Apprentice] might show itself in a few hours."
"Yes, it's not definite but [Apprentice] might appear in a few hours."
"Rogio, can you send me the analytical data that you have?"

"I see...
Not only the atmosphere, but the contents of the sand as well...
Indeed."
"It's been like this on Lillipa for a while now, so I thought that maybe..."

"Haha, after all of the calculations.
It's not your typical enemy."
"<%me>, I'll confirm Rogio's prediction. Can you sortie immediately?"
"Wait, I'll go too!"
"Oh no Matoi. You have an inspection to attend to."
"Eeeh? Again?! No way, I wanna go too!"
"Should I call Philia?"

"<%me>...
Take care, okay? I'll be cheering for you."

"I have a really bad feeling about what might happen if Matoi meets [Apprentice]...
Sorry about this, but I'm counting on you."
